clintock:A4.NAME: Sequencer\\SuperSeq
clintock:A4.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, apply a random AA.

clintock:A5.NAME: ATP Reserves
clintock:A5.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted this battle (Exhausted !M! cards).
clintock:A5.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each card Exhausted this battle (Exhausted 1 card).

clintock:A7.NAME: Sugar Rush
clintock:A7.DESCRIPTION: Lose half of your Sugar. Apply that much Poison.

clintock:A8.NAME: Mirror Pool
clintock:A8.DESCRIPTION: Swap Sugar and Phosphate amounts. Exhaust.

clintock:A9.NAME: Lethal Injection
clintock:A9.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply a random AA to your Peptide-Chain.

clintock:A10.NAME: Random Buff
clintock:A10.DESCRIPTION: Randomly gain X NL of one of the following: Strength, Dexterity, or Fluorophores
clintock:A10.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X NL of ALL of the following: Strength, Dexterity, and Fluorophores

clintock:A11.NAME: Life Tap
clintock:A11.DESCRIPTION: Lose X HP. NL Gain X Energy. NL Draw X cards. NL Exhaust.
clintock:A11.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose X HP. NL Gain X Energy. NL Draw X cards.

clintock:A12.NAME: Phalanx Support
clintock:A12.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you Bound a Nucleobase this turn, draw 1 card.

clintock:A13.NAME: Feel Less Pain
clintock:A13.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, NL gain !M! Block.

clintock:A14.NAME: Poison Plus
clintock:A14.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your Peptide-Chain contains a Nonessential AA, apply !M! Poison.

clintock:A15.NAME: Poison Stab
clintock:A15.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each Bound Nucleobase, apply !M! Poison.

clintock:Adenine.NAME: Adenine
clintock:Adenine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Adenine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Alkylation.NAME: Alkylation
clintock:Alkylation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke each Pyrimidine orb X+1 times.

clintock:BruteForce.NAME: Brute Force
clintock:BruteForce.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. Gain 1 Phosphate for each Weakened enemy.

clintock:CompostBin.NAME: Compost Bin
clintock:CompostBin.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Phosphate equal to twice its cost.
clintock:CompostBin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain Phosphate equal to three times its cost.

clintock:Cytosine.NAME: Cytosine
clintock:Cytosine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Cytosine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Deoxyadenosine.NAME: Deoxyadenosine
clintock:Deoxyadenosine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Bind 1 Adenine.

clintock:Deoxycytidine.NAME: Deoxycytidine
clintock:Deoxycytidine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Bind 1 Cytosine.

clintock:Deoxyguanosine.NAME: Deoxyguanosine
clintock:Deoxyguanosine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Next turn, gain !M! energy. NL Bind 1 Guanine.

clintock:DnaMicroarray.NAME: DNA Microarray
clintock:DnaMicroarray.DESCRIPTION: Add all four Nucleobases to your hand. Exhaust.

clintock:Eureka.NAME: Eureka!
clintock:Eureka.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Power, gain !M! Fluorophore.
clintock:Eureka.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. If you draw a Power, gain !M! Fluorophores.

clintock:Guanine.NAME: Guanine
clintock:Guanine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Guanine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Immunodeficiency.NAME: Immunodeficiency
clintock:Immunodeficiency.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

clintock:Ketosis.NAME: Ketosis
clintock:Ketosis.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL For each Bound Guanine or Thymine, deal !D! damage.

clintock:MineAndDine.NAME: Mine and Dine
clintock:MineAndDine.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Sugar and !M! Phosphate.

clintock:MonomerSynthesis.NAME: Monomer Synthesis
clintock:MonomerSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Nucleobase to your hand.

clintock:Nanopore.NAME: Nanopore
clintock:Nanopore.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a random Nucleobase to your hand.

clintock:Polymerize.NAME: Polymerize
clintock:Polymerize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you Bound a Nucleobase this turn, gain !B! Block again.

clintock:ProteinUtilization.NAME: Protein Utilization
clintock:ProteinUtilization.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If your Peptide-Chain contains an Essential AA, target ALL enemies.

clintock:PurineMetabolism.NAME: Purine Metabolism
clintock:PurineMetabolism.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Purine orb.

clintock:Replenish.NAME: Replenish
clintock:Replenish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Sugar. NL Gain !M! Phosphate.
clintock:Replenish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Sugars. NL Gain !M! Phosphates.

clintock:TelomereErosion.NAME: Telomere Erosion
clintock:TelomereErosion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, draw !M! cards.

clintock:Thymine.NAME: Thymine
clintock:Thymine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Bind 1 Thymine. NL Exhaust.

clintock:Thymidine.NAME: Thymidine
clintock:Thymidine.DESCRIPTION: Nucleoside. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Bind 1 Thymine.

clintock:VectorFlow.NAME: Vector Flow
clintock:VectorFlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Costs 1 less [R] for each Nucleobase Bound this turn.
